title: Why Chinese products are cheaper than USA (WARNING - graphic)

content: LOL. Hahaha. You got to love how unpussified the rest of the world is when it comes to flesh and bone. They just take charge and do what has to be done. I agree with their negotiation tactics 100%. I am completely for everybody having equal rights and equal opportunity. But, as soon as you have shown that you are attempting to take another persons life (or, at least appearing to do so), then it is necessary for anyone in close proximity to stop you from doing so. Even if that entails taking your (the hostage taker/life threatener) life in process.

content: Pistol bullet, 35 cents or so, rifle bullet, 50 cents and up. They saved 15 cents easy there. “If you bring these leaders to trial, it will condemn the North, for by the Constitution, secession is not rebellion...His (Jeff Davis') capture was a mistake. His trial will be a greater one. We cannot convict him of treason." Chief Justice Salmon P. Chase, 1867.
